name: Innocent's Purgatory Demo
description:
Story

This is the story of Ethan who wakes up in a strange place and meets Sarah, both of them have forgotten everything except their names. Ethan must find out what they are doing in that place and find a way to escape from the purgatory.

Can you find a way to escape and discover the secrets of this purgatory? Or will you find your end in it?

Innocents Purgatory is a horror themed first person RPG.

Explore the purgatory to discover its secrets.

Melee combat the evil spirits of the purgatory.

Use magic to gain an advantage over your opponents.
